name: The SPUD GAME
description:
Welcome to The Spud Game!

Take control of a farmer.  Not just any farmer however...

..This is a MIRACLE POTATO farmer!

Our Miracle Potato Farmer's neighbours are rather jealous of their miracle potatoes, to they decide to break into the farm, and steal ALL THE POTATOES!

But of course, this farmer doesn't want that, so they're going to FIGHT BACK!

HOW TO PLAY:

Try to survive a 2 minute day, as your neighbours bust into your farm, and try to get out with your potatoes!

Use WSA, and D to control the farmer.

Left click to launch Miracle potatoes out of the potato cannon. Try to aim them at the nosy neighbour  farmers, and get them BEFORE they reach your Miracle Potato Tower at the right most side of the map.

Some of your farmer neighbours recognise the irony of you shooting Miracle potatoes at them and can catch the potatoes out of the air, allowing them to try and leave before  reaching the Potato Tower.

As you only have 10 potatoes to fire, you will have to strategise, and hit as MANY farmers with as few potatoes as possible.  Then, if you ever run out of potatoes, it'll be a mad dash to get to your potato crop in time to refill your cannon, and get the farmers before they can escape!

MODIFIERS:

As the days go by, the farmers will build walls to block you and your potatoes.  This will cause you to have to strategise even MORE in order to advance!

The Achievements page will fill up with text telling you how many days you've completed, as a useful way to remember how far you've come!
